matching.title: Finding your match...
matching.description: We're searching for the best available appointment that fits your preferences.

steps.matchingBestSlot: Matching you with the best time slot...

empty.title: No appointments
empty.description: Try changing the status filter or book a new appointment.

emptyOthers.title: No other appointments
emptyOthers.description: Try changing the filters to see more.

awaitConfirm.title: Awaiting confirmation
awaitConfirm.description: We've found a match! Waiting for {{doctorName}} to confirm your appointment.

confirmed.title: Appointment confirmed!
confirmed.description: Your appointment has been confirmed. We've sent the details to your email and phone.

canceled.title: Appointment canceled
canceled.description: You've canceled this appointment request. You can submit a new request anytime.

declined.title: Appointment declined
declined.description: Unfortunately, {{doctorName}} is unable to accept this appointment. Please try booking with another doctor.

cancelDialog.title: Cancel appointment?
cancelDialog.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your appointment with {{doctorName}} on {{date}}?
cancelDialog.cancellationPolicyText: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the appointment.

reschedule.title: Reschedule
reschedule.whyTitle: Why do you want to reschedule?
reschedule.whySubtitle: This helps us highlight better alternatives. You can skip this step.

conflict.label: Time conflict
conflict.description: I cannot make the current time.

later.label: Later fits better
later.description: A later time works better for me.

confirm.title: Confirm reschedule
confirm.safetyNote: Your previous appointment will only be cancelled after the new appointment is confirmed.

errors.slotUnavailable: This time slot is no longer available. Please select another time.

success.title: Appointment rescheduled
success.subtitle: An updated confirmation has been sent via email and push notification.

suggestions.title: Suggested alternatives
suggestions.subtitle: We found these times based on your previous preference.

empty.title: No slots available
empty.description: There are no alternative slots available at this time.

suggestions.noneWork: None of these work for you?
